channel.title: Installing something only on one screen name
channel.description: Is there a way to just download something to one screen name for XP? Cuz sometimes things I download get put onto the other screen name's desktop, not that big of a deal, but my mom gets annoyed sometimes. Any help would be appreciated. :)
